resources.string:
- Start by dragging the colored dot to match same colored dot with pipes.
 - Goal is to pair up all the colored dots covering the whole board with pipes.
 - You cannot overlap or cross the pipes.
 - Level of difficulty increases as you play on large sized boards.
 - Get into arcade mode and see how many puzzles you can solve in limited time.

string-array.name: Almost_there_line
string-array.item: Fill whole board with pipe to

resources.string: Are you sure to reset all progress? This will reset all levels completed, scores and hints.
in the best move and got 2 hints.
You\'ve reached the end of the {NAMEPACK}.

- Start by dragging the colored dot to match same colored dot with pipes.
 - Goal is to pair up all the colored dots covering the whole board with pipes.
 - You cannot overlap or cross the pipes except in case you encounter a bridge
 - Level of difficulty increases as you play on large sized boards.
 - Get into arcade mode and see how many puzzles you can solve in limited time.

string-array.name: How_to_play
string-array.item: Connect dots of same color to score points.
Make a loop to remove all like-colored dots from the board and score more points!

resources.string: Select a dot to shrink off the board.

string-array.name: Intro_Trade
string-array.item: Trade the dots for 1 Timer Stop

string-array.name: How_to_play4
string-array.item:
To clear blocks, simply drag them to match 4 or more of the same color blocks in a row. You can match vertically, horizontally or diagonally.

 Move Anywhere: allows a block to be moved to any unoccupied spot on the board.

 Made a mistake? Fix it with Undo.

string-array.name: How_to_play5
string-array.item:
Keep bustin to keep flown!

 Bust same color dots.

 The more the better.

 Get enough score to reach target and move on to next level.

string-array.name: How_to_play6
string-array.item: Connect each red dot to a blue dot, using only straight lines

string-array.name: How_to_play7
string-array.item:
- Drag to connect matching colors with pipe, creating a flow.
 - Pair all colors, cover the entire board with pipe, and avoid blocks to solve each puzzle.
 - But watch out, pipe will break if they cross or overlap! Use the bridge to cross two pipes and solve the puzzle.
 - Too easy? Try selecting a larger board or different level pack. Or see how fast you can solve in Time Trial mode.

string-array.name: How_to_play8
string-array.item: Tap the dot to move lines.
The dots must touch each other.

string-array.name: How_to_play9
string-array.item: - Connect all the dots in the puzzle with a continuous path without reusing any completed path.\n - Use hints if you got stuck.\n

string-array.name: How_to_play10
string-array.item: Match 3 or more color shapes in a row vertically or diagonally to win and score more points before time runs out.

resources.string:
- To complete the puzzle, link every pair of similar colored cells.
 - Tap on the marked colored cell (with black border) to select the color.
 you can tap on other cells to color them with the selected color, or
 optionally you can drag to color multiple cells. Marked colored cells will light up when connected.
 - You cannot link cells diagonally. Cross cells are blocked.
 - If you break an existing link, reselect the color of the broken 
 link by tapping on one of the marked colored cells and fill the gaps.
 -Hint: Often the direct route is not the correct solution.
- Make line to connect two dots forming a square. \n - Whoever makes more squares wins the game

string-array.name: How_to_play13
string-array.item: - Tap on 4 or more connected blocks of same color to bust them.\n - Clear all blocks to solve the puzzle.

resources.string: You need to restart level again.
Are you sure, you want to exit this game?
Are you sure, you want to restart the game?

1. The main objective of this game is to line up each of the circles to their corresponding colors on each side of the square board

2. Notice the colors on each side of the game board 

RED -> TOP 
 BLUE -> LEFT 
 YELLOW -> BOTTOM 
 GREEN -> RIGHT 

3. Now try to move the circle and place them at the correct position. 

4. For eg., all the green circles must be placed at bottom to the board. Similarly all other circle must be placed in a similar way. 

5. You cannot move the circle through a square with the same color.
-Select the column you wish to drop your piece in.\n -Touch the screen to drop your piece\n -When you can connect four pieces vertically, horizontally or diagonally you win

- Start by dragging the numbered cell to make a incremental sequence.
 - Goal is to connect all the numbered cell in the board.
 - You can overlap or cross the pipes.
 - Level of difficulty increases as you play on large sized boards.
New update is available in Google Play with more free brain and puzzle games.
Unfortunately you missed more new games!
Are you sure to reset all progress? This will reset all levels completed, scores and hints.
The goal is to clear all boxes by moving each box to match same color

Tic-tac-toe game strategy:
 -Win: If the player has two in a row, play the third to get three in a row.
 -Block: If the opponent has two in a row, play the third to block them.
 -Fork: Create an opportunity where you can win tic tac toe game in two ways.

- Start by dragging the smallest numbered dot to the next numbered dot.
 - Goal is to connect all numbered dots in ascending order covering the whole board with pipes.
 - You cannot overlap or cross the pipes.
 - Level of difficulty increases as you play on large sized boards.

string-array.name: Help_color_stack
string-array.item:
- Make stack of the moving block just above the other one.
 - The block size decreases if the block miss the exact alignment.
 - Game ends when you completly miss to align the moving block.

string-array.name: Help_light_out
string-array.item: - Tapping on a cell toggles that cell and each of its immediate neighbours.\n - The goal is to turn out all the lights.\n

string-array.name: Help_linesweeper
string-array.item:
- Draw a closed loop of line by draging.
 - The orange coloured cells contains number which represents the number of adjacent sides the line should touch.
 - A closed loop of line touching the adjacent side of orange cells completes the level.

string-array.name: Help_unblock
string-array.item: - The goal is to slide out the yellow block out of the board relocating other blocks\n - Each block slides either horizontally or vertically only.\n

string-array.name: boxFlow_How_to_play
string-array.item: - Touch by draging the colored cell to fill the board.\n - The goal is to fill up the board with colors on each cell which is specified in the main colored cell.

string-array.name: connect_How_to_play
string-array.item: - Drag the orange colored dots so that the line intersects all red dots \n - When all red dots are intersected and it turns out into white dots you level up.

resources.string: in the best time and got 2 hints.

#	 Select the block and place it on a rectangular block where it is most relevant 

	 #	 Then fill up the block pieces 

	 #	 There are 16 different packages to play you can select any of them 

	 #	 If you are stuck somewhere in the middle of the game then you can use hint 

	 #	 If you finish the game within 60 seconds then you will gain two additional hints, otherwise you will gain only one hint

#	 The game starts from point S 

	 #	 You can choose random color that are close to the start point 

	 # 	 After selecting any one random color, the color of start point changes to the selected point 

	 #	 Now all the edge points will be a new start point and you can pick any random color that are close to the new start point 

	 #	 The game completes if all the color in the board is same 

	 #	 You must complete the game in best move or a move higher than the best move, otherwise the game is over 

	 #	 You will gain 2 hints if game ends in best move or less else you will gain only 1 move
You need to restart the game

#	 

	 #	 You can swipe the ball in four different direction that is, left, right , up down 

	 # 	 Balls always move, unless the ared BLOCKED 

	 #	 All the balls moves at once if there are no obstacles 

	 #	 The game end when all the ball is placed to the grids with thier corresponding colors 

	 #	 The must be completed before the moves ends
